_header: My dear leman behold thou me
_description: Christ on the tree — four couplets in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.First Lines:
Mi dere lemman behold þu meHou I hange on rode
                    tre…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…& þu salt hauen þat blissingÞat þe
                    may ȝeuem heuene king Amen
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 41.
